constantValues: A Budget represents the amount of funds that can be awarded for a particular delivery framework (i.e Program, Project, Initiative, Activity) for a defined period of time (i.e. fiscal year).

definitions.description: A Budget represents the amount of funds that can be awarded for a particular delivery framework (i.e Program, Project, Initiative, Activity) for a defined period of time (i.e. fiscal year).
